no_pass_placeholder: Press the button button below to add your pass
take_photo_description: Take a picture of the pass (eg: papery)
pick_photo_description: Choose a picture from gallery (eg: screenshot)
pdf_too_large: The chosen PDF is too big, try again.
no_qr_found: No QR code found, make sure that the picture is correct and well lit
name: Name
camera_permission_denied: Permission denied, try again or enable it manually!
